name: PaintXpress
technology: TypeScript, Next.js, AntDesign, Firebase, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB.
desc: Dynamic Filtering Tools Refine the options based on service categories, Price range. Watch as the webpage dynamically updates, displaying only the services that match the criteria. Experience the beauty of responsive design across all devices. It is meticulously crafted with a mobile-first approach, ensuring a seamless experience on smartphones, tablets, and desktops.

name: T-52 Mobile Zone
technology: React.JS, React Bootstrap, React-Router,CSS, Redux, Firebase Authentication, Node.JS, Express, MongoDB, Heroku
desc: A complete Mobile Phone selling website with google authentication. Users can order products and manage their orders. And dashboard is available on this website. Worked as a backend developer on this project.

name: The Fragrance Shop
technology: React.JS, React Bootstrap, React-Router, Node.JS, Express,MongoDB, Heroku, CSS, Stripe, Firebase Authentication
desc: In this website Implemented a dashboard where the admin can add brands and manage orders by the customers. Users can order products and they can cancel their orders if they want. Implemented a payment method where users can pay for buying products using stripe.

name: Holiday Planner
technology: React.JS, Node.JS, Express,MongoDB, React Bootstrap, React-Router, Heroku, CSS, Firebase Authentication
desc: On this travel agency website, users can buy their favorite travel packages after logging in. As the admin panel is not implemented, the admin and user both can add more travel packages.Users can update their order status and also cancel it if they want.

desc: On this website, users can Book services after logging in. It is a fully responsive template and build with React.Js. Admin can manage all services, they can add or remove services in Dashboard.

name: Canvas Creation
